title: Tailor

fields.name: Invent Evidence:
fields.value: You recieve a list of random players based on your score. You may choose one, and whether the evidence makes them look guilty or innocent. Any investigations made on a player made to look guilty will turn up as if they are mafia, and any investigations made on a player made to look innocent will turn up as if they are town.

fields.name: Gaslight (Charge 100%):
fields.value: Target a player who placed below you in the last evening phase. You will recieve a list of their targets and can choose the outcome of their investigation. If they do more than one investigation, you will be able to choose the outcome of all of them. Non-investigative actions are ignored.

fields.name: Dig Their Grave (charge 350%):
fields.value: Target a player. For the rest of the game, any investigative action used on them will provide a result as if they were Mafia. You will instantly die at the end of the night phase.

desc:
Post 92
*With one swipe of the pen, I can make you look innocent! And then with another, I can frame a target.*
